statements.insert:
select SEQ_PM_Bill_Iron_Id.nextval as IntId from dual
insert into PM_Bill_Iron ( I_IntId ,C_PlanNo ,C_HeatNo ,C_BatchNo ,C_LronNo ,C_TankNo ,C_ToDeptNo ,C_ToDeptName ,I_BillStatus ,C_Remark ,C_Reserve1 ,C_Reserve2 ,C_Reserve3 ,I_Reserve1 ,I_Reserve2 ,I_Reserve3 ,C_CreateUser ,D_CreateTime ,C_UpdateUser ,D_UpdateTime )values (#IntId#,GETPLANNO('A0JL','C_PlanNo','PM_Bill_Iron'),#HeatNo#,#BatchNo#,#LronNo#,#TankNo#,#ToDeptNo#,#ToDeptName#,#BillStatus.IntValue#,#Remark#,#CReserve1#,#CReserve2#,#CReserve3#,#IReserve1#,#IReserve2#,#IReserve3#,#CreateUserName#,to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss'),#UpdateUserName#,to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss'))
statements.update: update PM_Bill_Iron set I_IntId=#IntId# ,C_PlanNo=#PlanNo# ,C_HeatNo=#HeatNo# ,C_BatchNo=#BatchNo# ,C_LronNo=#LronNo# ,C_TankNo=#TankNo# ,C_ToDeptNo=#ToDeptNo# ,C_ToDeptName=#ToDeptName# ,I_BillStatus=#BillStatus.IntValue# ,C_Remark=#Remark# ,C_Reserve1=#CReserve1# ,C_Reserve2=#CReserve2# ,C_Reserve3=#CReserve3# ,I_Reserve1=#IReserve1# ,I_Reserve2=#IReserve2# ,I_Reserve3=#IReserve3# ,C_UpdateUser=#UpdateUserName# ,D_UpdateTime=to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss') where I_IntId = #IntId#
update PM_Bill_Iron set I_BillStatus=#BillStatus.IntValue# ,C_UpdateUser=#UpdateUserName# ,D_UpdateTime=to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss') where I_IntId = #IntId#
statements.select: select a.I_IntId ,a.C_PlanNo ,a.C_HeatNo ,a.C_BatchNo ,a.C_LronNo ,a.C_TankNo ,a.C_ToDeptNo ,a.C_ToDeptName ,a.I_BillStatus ,a.C_Remark ,a.C_Reserve1 ,a.C_Reserve2 ,a.C_Reserve3 ,a.I_Reserve1 ,a.I_Reserve2 ,a.I_Reserve3 ,a.C_CreateUser ,a.D_CreateTime ,a.C_UpdateUser ,a.D_UpdateTime from PM_Bill_Iron a order by a.I_IntId desc

select a.I_IntId ,a.C_PlanNo ,a.C_HeatNo ,a.C_BatchNo ,a.C_LronNo ,a.C_TankNo ,a.C_ToDeptNo ,a.C_ToDeptName ,a.I_BillStatus ,a.C_Remark ,a.C_Reserve1 ,a.C_Reserve2 ,a.C_Reserve3 ,a.I_Reserve1 ,a.I_Reserve2 ,a.I_Reserve3 ,a.C_CreateUser ,a.D_CreateTime ,a.C_UpdateUser ,a.D_UpdateTime from PM_Bill_Iron a where a.C_PlanNo = #Value# order by a.I_IntId desc

select a.I_IntId ,a.C_PlanNo ,a.C_HeatNo ,a.C_BatchNo ,a.C_LronNo ,a.C_TankNo ,a.C_ToDeptNo ,a.C_ToDeptName ,a.I_BillStatus ,a.C_Remark ,a.C_Reserve1 ,a.C_Reserve2 ,a.C_Reserve3 ,a.I_Reserve1 ,a.I_Reserve2 ,a.I_Reserve3 ,a.C_CreateUser ,a.D_CreateTime ,a.C_UpdateUser ,a.D_UpdateTime from PM_Bill_Iron a where a.C_TankNo in ($TankNo$) and a.I_BillStatus=0 order by a.I_IntId desc

select a.I_IntId ,a.C_PlanNo ,a.C_HeatNo ,a.C_BatchNo ,a.C_LronNo ,a.C_TankNo ,a.C_ToDeptNo ,a.C_ToDeptName ,a.I_BillStatus ,a.C_Remark ,a.C_Reserve1 ,a.C_Reserve2 ,a.C_Reserve3 ,a.I_Reserve1 ,a.I_Reserve2 ,a.I_Reserve3 ,a.C_CreateUser ,a.D_CreateTime ,a.C_UpdateUser ,a.D_UpdateTime from PM_Bill_Iron a where a.D_CREATETIME between #StartTime# and #EndTime#
